query:
select
                    valid_from as "valid_from!: crate::types::DateTime",
                    valid_until as "valid_until?: crate::types::DateTime",
                    json_group_object(product_id, weight) as "product_group!: sqlx::types::Json<Map<ProductId>>"
                from
                    product_group
                where
                    portfolio_id = $1
                and
                    ($2 is null or valid_from >= $2)
                and
                    ($3 is null or valid_until is null or valid_until < $3)
                group by
                    valid_from
                order by
                    valid_from desc
                limit $4
